Package com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms

Class DBEngineAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms.DBEngineAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
MariaDBAdapter, OracleAdapter, PostgreSQLAdapter
public abstract class DBEngineAdapter extends Object
A DBEngineAdapter addresses the particular properties of different RBDMS systems, like column definition or type mapping.
Author:
Miquel Sas

      public String getFieldDefinitionSuffix(Field field)
      Returns the suffix part of a field definition, that is standard, with DEFAULT values and NOT NULL.

      field - The argument field.
      Returns:
      The suffix part of the field definition.

    • toStringSQL

      public abstract String toStringSQL(Value value)
      Convert the argument value to a string that can be used in a SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE or WHERE query. Note that type BINARY issues an error.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to format as a string.
      Returns:
      The formatted string.
